alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Catoosa, north central Murray and northeastern Whitfield Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Ringgold, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Chatsworth, Ringgold, Varnell, Eton, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Beaverdale, Sumac, Indian Springs, Graysville and Gregory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
